frontmatter.title: Sample sentence
frontmatter.excerpt: The idea here is to figure out the translation of a random sentence I've come up with: You're only mad because they stole the izakaya's tame monkey.

frontmatter.title: Python: Neat string formatting
frontmatter.excerpt: In my efforts to learn python, I've been spending some time on Codewars doing katas. Apart from being a good place to come across problems to solve, Codewars also lists top voted solutions for katas which are a great source for learning some new tricks.
